001package io.github.ai4ci.config.setup;
002
003import org.immutables.value.Value;
004import org.jgrapht.generate.WattsStrogatzGraphGenerator;
005import org.jgrapht.graph.DefaultEdge;
006import org.jgrapht.graph.SimpleGraph;
007
008import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.annotation.JsonDeserialize;
009import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.annotation.JsonSerialize;
010
011import io.github.ai4ci.abm.Person;
012
013/**
014 * Watts‑Strogatz network configuration.
015 *
016 * <p>
017 * This configuration encapsulates parameters used to generate a small‑world
018 * social network using the JGraphT {@code WattsStrogatzGraphGenerator}. It is
019 * consumed by network construction code in the model builder during the setup
020 * stage and is not used directly during simulation runtime.
021 *
022 * <p>
023 * Downstream uses: passed to the builder's
024 * {@link io.github.ai4ci.flow.builders.DefaultModelBuilder#setupOutbreak} which
025 * invokes {@link #generateGraph(SimpleGraph)} to populate the social network
026 * graph used by the simulation.
027 *
028 * <p>
029 * Extension guidance: to alter the seeding or node placement strategy replace
030 * or extend the {@link io.github.ai4ci.flow.builders.DefaultNetworkSetup}
031 * implementation rather than changing this configuration class.
032 *
033 * @author Rob Challen
034 */
035@Value.Immutable
036@JsonSerialize(as = ImmutableWattsStrogatzConfiguration.class)
037@JsonDeserialize(as = ImmutableWattsStrogatzConfiguration.class)
038public interface WattsStrogatzConfiguration extends NetworkConfiguration {
039
040        ImmutableWattsStrogatzConfiguration DEFAULT = ImmutableWattsStrogatzConfiguration
041                        .builder().setNetworkSize(128 * 128).setNetworkDegree(100)
042                        .setNetworkRandomness(0.15).build();
043
044        /**
045         * Populate the supplied social network graph using the stored parameters.
046         *
047         * @param socialNetwork an empty JGraphT SimpleGraph to populate with nodes
048         *                      and edges
049         */
050        @Override
051        default void generateGraph(SimpleGraph<Person, DefaultEdge> socialNetwork) {
052                WattsStrogatzGraphGenerator<Person, DefaultEdge> gen = new WattsStrogatzGraphGenerator<>(
053                                this.getNetworkSize(),
054                                Math.min(this.getNetworkDegree(), this.getNetworkSize()) / 2 * 2,
055                                this.getNetworkRandomness()
056                );
057                gen.generateGraph(socialNetwork);
058        }
059
060        /**
061         * Model parameter specific to Watts‑Strogatz.
062         *
063         * @return the probability of re‑wiring a social network edge
064         */
065        Double getNetworkRandomness();
066}
